variations.name: 19 pop
variations.desc: The fastest possible scouts build with most civs. Hit with the first 2 scouts to deny walls. Usually you have to delay eco techs for this. The goal is to keep the opponent open so you can scout, force idle time, and pick off villagers.

name: Man-at-arms

variations.name: 20 pop
variations.desc: A variation of the scouts build which goes up a bit later than 19 pop, which gives a bit more resources to wall.

variations.name: 21 pop
variations.desc: A beginner build which is easy to execute, but hits after many opponents have already fully walled their base.
